body:
https://github.com/cython/cython/tree/3.0.0a9

I have to update to this version to be able to update `py-gevent`.
Since this `py-cython` version is an alpha release I did not want to break anything for the other packages and added a preference to 0.29.24. Once the proper release is out, we can remove the preference again.
title: py-cython: add 3.0.0a9
